organizer:
Chairman: Zhengming Wang 
 Vice Chairman: Terrence Chen 
 Conductor: Sheng Ding
rehearsal location: The Orchestra practices every Saturday morning, 10:00 am – 12:00 noon at 1470 Highland Cove Ln, Millcreek, UT
join-info: Join our orchestra and be part of a vibrant musical community where East meets West. Whether you play a Chinese instrument like the erhu or pipa, or a Western one like the violin or flute, your talent is welcome here. All levels are encouraged—come share your passion and grow with us!
Name: Name
mission: Utah Chinese Folk Orchestra was established in 2005. It is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. Members are volunteers who love Chinese music, can play some musical instrument (Western or Chinese). Its mission is to promote culture diversity and Chinese Culture through music.
